Notes: 
Alternate, Deleted & Extended Scenes have also commentary subs for all languages listed above.
Audio DD 2.0 @192 (original) & Commentaries are AAC-LC 2.0 vrb.
Those who want to hear Dir Commentary with the movie, copy it next to movie, 
rename it as the movie and play the mkv with MPC and switch the track.
It's separate for two reasons: 
-not all folks want it 
-some prefer to listen to it on smart phone going to work for instance.
